alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 30 at 6:19PM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Miami-Dade County through 645 PM EST... At 618 PM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive, or near Kendall, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kendall, The Redland, Richmond West, Richmond Heights, Country Walk, Kendale Lakes, West Kendall, Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive, The Crossings, Tamiami, The Hammocks, Zoo Miami, Sunset, University Park, Kendall West, Inlikita, The Falls, Three Lakes, Howard and Westwood Lakes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
